plot: Nick and Hank are called to investigate a double homicide, and quickly learn the victims were from a special section of the Verrat tasked with finding rare objects pertaining to the Wesen world. Trubel gets involved with a mysterious father-and-son tandem that crossed the country in a desperate attempt to deliver invaluable cargo to "the Portland Grimm." Meanwhile, Captain Renard begins to grow suspicious of Adalind's recent behavior and quietly decides to put extra eyes on her.—Anonymous

Reluctantly, young Josh Porter brought his dying father Rolek from Pennsylvania to Portland to meet Nick and hand him a trunk. They must run being attacked in their hotel by a Verrat henchman, whom Rolek manages to stab fatally. In Nick's absence, Trubel goes with Josh and finds Rolek a Grimm, the trunk full of fascinating stuff, but the dying man also mentions a key. Adalind seduces Renard again but betrays him to sneakily get Juliette's organic material for a transformation potion. Despite the advanced wedding preparations, Rosalee gets a terrible premonition.—KGF Vissers
